info.name: Travel and Accommodation Booking Platform API 1

item.name: Retrieves the details of a specific booking payment for the user.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the booking.

response.name: Returns the details of the payment.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Unauthorized if credentials are invalid.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: If a resource is not found (e.g. Booking, Payment).

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Retrieves the details of a specific booking for the user.

query.description:
Indicates whether the calculated price for the booking should be included in the response.
If set to true, the total price including any applicable discounts will be included.

Indicates whether the hotel details associated with the booking should be included in the response.
If set to true, detailed information about the hotel will be included.

Indicates whether the list of rooms included in the booking should be included in the response.
If set to true, details about the rooms booked will be included.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the booking.

response.name: Returns the details of the booking.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

query.description:
Indicates whether the calculated price for the booking should be included in the response.
If set to true, the total price including any applicable discounts will be included.

Indicates whether the hotel details associated with the booking should be included in the response.
If set to true, detailed information about the hotel will be included.

Indicates whether the list of rooms included in the booking should be included in the response.
If set to true, details about the rooms booked will be included.

response.name: Unauthorized if credentials are invalid.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

query.description:
Indicates whether the calculated price for the booking should be included in the response.

Indicates whether the hotel details associated with the booking should be included in the response.
If set to true, detailed information about the hotel will be included.

Indicates whether the list of rooms included in the booking should be included in the response.
If set to true, details about the rooms booked will be included.

response.name: If the booking is not found for the user.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Deletes an existing booking for the user.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the booking to delete.

response.name: No content if the deletion is successful.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Unauthorized if credentials are invalid.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: If the booking is not found.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: If the booking cannot be deleted due to conflicts (e.g. existing payment).

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Retrieves bookings for the user with various filtering options.

query.description:
The current page number to retrieve.
Must be a positive integer.

The number of items to include on each page of results.
Must be a positive integer.

The timespan option to filter bookings by their time period. Options:
<list type="bullet"><item><description>All - Includes all bookings regardless of time period.</description></item><item><description>PastOnly - Includes only past bookings.</description></item><item><description>FutureOnly - Includes only future bookings.</description></item></list>

Indicates whether to retrieve only the latest booking per hotel. If set to true,
only the latest booking per hotel will be retrieved based on the timespan filter.
So if PastOnly timespan is set, only the latest booking in the past for each hotel is retrieved.
The start date for filtering bookings by their check-in date.
The end date for filtering bookings by their check-in date.
The start date for filtering bookings by their check-out date.
The end date for filtering bookings by their check-out date.

response.name: Returns the bookings for the authenticated user.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

query.description:
The current page number to retrieve.
Must be a positive integer.

The number of items to include on each page of results.
Must be a positive integer.

The timespan option to filter bookings by their time period. Options:
<list type="bullet"><item><description>All - Includes all bookings regardless of time period.</description></item><item><description>PastOnly - Includes only past bookings.</description></item><item><description>FutureOnly - Includes only future bookings.</description></item></list>

Indicates whether to retrieve only the latest booking per hotel. If set to true,
only the latest booking per hotel will be retrieved based on the timespan filter.
So if PastOnly timespan is set, only the latest booking in the past for each hotel is retrieved.
The start date for filtering bookings by their check-in date.
The end date for filtering bookings by their check-in date.
The start date for filtering bookings by their check-out date.
The end date for filtering bookings by their check-out date.

response.name: If the request is invalid.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Searches for hotels based on provided filters and returns available search filters.

query.description:
The current page number to retrieve.
Must be a positive integer.

The number of items to include on each page of results.
Must be a positive integer.
The search term to use when searching for hotels (e.g., hotel name or city name).

The number of rooms required for the booking.
Any hotel will lower number of rooms will be disqualified from the search

A list of allowed star ratings for the hotels in the search results.
Any hotel with a different start rate will be disqualified from the search

A list of allowed star ratings for the hotels in the search results.
Any hotel with a different start rate will be disqualified from the search

A list of required amenities for the hotels in the search results.
Any hotel with at least one missing amenity will be disqualified from the search

A list of required amenities for the hotels in the search results.
Any hotel with at least one missing amenity will be disqualified from the search

A list of required room types for the hotels in the search results.
Any hotel with at least one missing room type will be disqualified from the search

A list of required room types for the hotels in the search results.
Any hotel with at least one missing room type will be disqualified from the search

The sorting option to apply to the search results.
Default is by hotel name.
Indicates whether the available search filters should be included in the response.
Indicates whether to include price deals if available for the hotels in the search results.

response.name: Returns the search results and filters.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

query.description:
The current page number to retrieve.
Must be a positive integer.

The number of items to include on each page of results.
Must be a positive integer.
The search term to use when searching for hotels (e.g., hotel name or city name).

The number of rooms required for the booking.
Any hotel will lower number of rooms will be disqualified from the search

A list of allowed star ratings for the hotels in the search results.
Any hotel with a different start rate will be disqualified from the search

A list of required amenities for the hotels in the search results.
Any hotel with at least one missing amenity will be disqualified from the search

A list of required room types for the hotels in the search results.
Any hotel with at least one missing room type will be disqualified from the search

The sorting option to apply to the search results.
Default is by hotel name.
Indicates whether the available search filters should be included in the response.
Indicates whether to include price deals if available for the hotels in the search results.

response.name: If the request is invalid.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

formdata.description: The name of the hotel.
(This can only be one of OneStar,TwoStars,ThreeStars,FourStars,FiveStars)
A description of the hotel, detailing its features and offerings.
The name of the owner of the hotel.
The thumbnail image representing the hotel.
A collection of additional images of the hotel.
The ID of the city where the hotel is located.
A list of amenities available at the hotel.

response.name: Returns the ID of the newly created hotel.
